QuestData.Title: Before the Gates of Orgrimmar
QuestData.Description:
It is time.
We have done all that we can to prepare. All that remains is the battle itself.
I am not one for speeches. So I will say only this.
Lok-tar ogar, $n. Victory. Or death.
QuestData.LogDescription: Begin the battle at the gates of Orgrimmar.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Saurfang to begin the battle
